note.p: Birth: Basseterre, St George parish, Saint Christopher (Saint Kitts), Leeward Islands, West Indies (19 March 1738)
Death: Government House, Antigua, Leeward Islands, West Indies (03 August 1807)
Burial: His mother's estate of Carlisle
Career: MP for Shaftesbury (1768); Governor, Leeward Island (1774-1775, 1801-1807); Clerk of the Board of Green Cloth (1755 until the office was abolished)
Notes: The name of his mother's estate may be the family rather than the place name
